RAG Test Information

This is a sample webpage designed to test the RAG functionality in the chat application.

About Retrieval-Augmented Generation

RAG systems combine the power of large language models with specific knowledge retrieval. This allows for more accurate and specific responses based on your actual data.

Benefits of RAG

  • More accurate responses based on your data
  • Reduced hallucinations
  • Ability to reference specific information
  • Up-to-date knowledge beyond the model's training cutoff

Technical Implementation

A typical RAG system includes:

  1. Document processing: Converting documents into chunks
  2. Embedding generation: Creating vector representations of text
  3. Vector database: Storing and searching these representations
  4. Retrieval mechanism: Finding relevant information based on queries
  5. Context augmentation: Adding retrieved information to prompts

This test page serves as an example of what content might be extracted from a webpage and incorporated into the RAG knowledge base.
